General.Name: Shenghe Resources Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenghe Resources Holding Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and supply of rare earth and related products in China and internationally. Its principal products include rare earth concentrates, rare earth oxides, rare earth salts and compounds, rare earth metals, rare earth metallurgical materials, rare earth catalytic materials, zircon sand, titanium concentrates, rutile, monazite, kyanite, garnet, etc., used in new energy, new materials, energy conservation and environmental protection, aerospace, military industry, electronic information, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Taiyuan Tiancheng Science & Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Shenghe Resources Holding Co., Ltd in January 2013. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, China.
